welcome_message_body: Welcome to Secaucus, where the hustle and bustle of the city meets the charm of a small town. Known for its picturesque parks and proximity to New York City, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Secaucus has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Teterboro Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for its passengers.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at LaGuardia, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at LaGuardia, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at LaGuardia, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A newer terminal at LaGuardia, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection at different terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Air France, Japan Airlines, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Delta Air Lines, Korean Air, and Virgin Atlantic.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves international and domestic airlines such as American Airlines, British Airways, and Emirates.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves domestic airlines such as JetBlue, Spirit Airlines, and Hawaiian Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as British Airways, Qatar Airways, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international airlines such as American Airlines, Finnair, and Qantas.

wifi.note: Limited free Wi-Fi access throughout the airport, with the option to purchase premium access.
